snippet.title: Mighty Switch Force! Collection - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Switch up the fun with four games in one with Mighty Switch Force! Collection! Take control of cybernetic peacekeeper Patricia Wagon and jump, shoot, and puzzle-solve your way through four fantastic games: Mighty Switch Force!, Mighty Switch Force! 2, Mighty Switch Force! Hyper Drive Edition, and Mighty Switch Force! Academy. Coming soon for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC! Rated E10+.
